options.name: Dark Dabblings
options.description: Learn 2 Beginner and 2 Novice Spells from the Witchcraft or Necromancy Schools of Magic

options.name: Twisted Sorcery
options.description: Gain +1 Arcanum and +1 Arcane, Divine and Dark Mitigation

options.name: Empowered Conduit
options.description: Your Conduit gains +4 Power and +4 Power Regeneration

options.name: Tainted Magic
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage but lose -1 Resilience

options.name: Free Action : Dark Gift
options.description: After rolling a Spell Attack from Channeling a Necromancy or Witchraft Spell, Reroll the Attack. If the result is the same or worse, take Psychic Damage equal to twice your level.

options.name: Action : Dark Prayer
options.description: You utter a Dark Prayer and roll a 1d4. You gain a Bonus to Resistance, Spell Attack and Attack until the start of your next turn equal to the result of the d4.

options.name: Dark Research
options.description: You can research and scribe Beginner and Novice spells from the Witchcraft and Necromancy schools of magic. At level 7, this extends to Journeyman spells and Expert spells at level 10. Additionally, gain +1 Scribing.
